name: Ladrillos
description:
Ladrillos is a simple game that takes inspiration in the classic BreakOut from Atari. As my first game made on Unity it was quite the challenge, but I manage to put a decent game. I'll probably make a better version in the future that add power-ups and other interesting concepts. In any case, I hope you enjoy my game as much I enjoyed making it.

Controls:

Use the mouse to direct the paddle. Don't let the ball fall!
